S04n356:1: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako'nupūrveṇa dakṣiṇāpathaṃ gatvā yena bharukacche nagare muktāsāro hairaṇyakaḥ,
S04n356:2: tenopasaṃkramya muktāsārahairaṇyakasya pādau śirasābhivandya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha-mayā ārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam |
S04n356:3: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04n356:5: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti |
S04n356:6: tadvadatu me āryaḥ-kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04n356:8: so'vocat-ahaṃ kulaputra asaṅgasmṛtivyūhaṃ nāma bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ jānāmi |
S04n356:9: apratiprasrabdhā ca me daśasu dikṣu sarvatathāgatapādamūleṣu dharmaparyeṣṭiḥ |
S04n356:10: etamahaṃ kulaputra asaṅgasmṛtivyūhaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ jānāmi, prajānāmi |
S04n356:11: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ bodhisattvānāmacchambhitasiṃhanādanādināṃ mahāpuṇyajñānapratiṣṭhitānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum ||
S04n356:13: ayamihaiva bharukacche nagare sucandro nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati |
S04n356:17: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako muktāsārasya hairaṇyakasya pādau śirasābhivandya muktāsāraṃ hairaṇyakamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya muktāsārasya hairaṇyakasyāntikātprakrāntaḥ ||47 ||
